name: Fill the Blanks
overview: A fill in the blank crossword puzzle from Loadstar #133, created by Clinton O'Neill and released in 1995. Try this variation of crossword puzzles that doesn't make you wear out your vocabulary bone. With Fill Ins you use words from a word list as the Search Word puzzles and put them in a crossword like grid or board. Fill Ins may also use numbers instead of words, but word and numbers are never mixed in the same puzzle. Fill 3 and Fill 4 are both numeric puzzles n this game of 10 puzzles to solve. Press 0 to get to the tenth puzzle. The words or numbers go from left to right and from top to bottom only. To erase a wrong word use the CRSR keys to position the blinking CRSR and press space to erase the word a letter at a time.
